item.title: Understanding Go: An exploratory blog series
item.description: Understanding Go is an exploratory blog series which attempts to explore and explain different aspects of the Go programming language in the easiest way possible.
item.dc:creator: Luca Peric
item.content:encoded: After spending the majority of my time working within the dynamically typed and interpreted languages, I've found myself (who?) wanting to explore more performant languages that are more viable within the modern tech stack for scalable architectures. I'll be exploring the language (standard library initially) from the bottom up in order to gain the best possible understanding of Go's different characteristics and best practices (both are not necessarily concepts exclusive to Go) followed by trying to detail the fresh learning path for easiest possible consumption (across time and explanation complexity).
